biotools.summary: Electronic Pharmacogenomics Assistant (ePGA) - browsing pharmacogenomics knowledge on gene-drug-phenotype associations and matching individual genotype-profiles with gene haplotypes and infering the corresponding diplotype and phenotype profiles.
